availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Satterfield (Caldwell County/ Livingston County, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County and Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Robertus Satterfield and Eliza Satterfield. Married to Lucinda Mildred Boyd Satterfield. Father of F. T. Satterfield. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Farmer in Livingston County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 371A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, p. 34.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 498B.
Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, Enumeration District 7, p. 1.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Livingston County, KY, June 1863, p. 30.
"James W Satterfield (1831-1915)," Find A Grave, Memorial #18481059, accessed September 28, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18481059.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births.
"Mildred Lucinda Satterfield (1833-1923)," Find A Grave, Memorial #191155084, accessed January 6, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/191155084.
